Package com.wilfredmorgan.imagegalleryapi.controllers

Class ImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wilfredmorgan.imagegalleryapi.controllers.ImageController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/images")
public class ImageController
extends java.lang.Object
    The entry point for clients to access image data

      • getAllImages

        @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ADMIN\')")
@GetMapping(value="/",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllImages()
        Returns a list of all images
        Returns:
        JSON list of all images with a status of OK
        See Also:
        ImageService.findAll()

                                                               long imageid)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        JSON object of the image you seek

      • addNewImage

        @PostMapping(value="/image",
             consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNewImage​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                              @Valid Image newimage)
                                                       throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Given a complete Image object, create a new Image record
        Parameters:
        newimage - A complete new image to add user must already exist.
        Returns:
        A location header with the URI to the newly created image and a status of CREATED
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - Exception if something does not work in creating the location header
        See Also:
        ImageService.save(Image)

      • replaceImage

        @PutMapping(value="/image/{imageid}",
            consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> replaceImage​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                               @Valid Image replaceImage,
                                                               @PathVariable
                                                               long imageid)
        Given a complete User Object Given the user id, primary key, is in the User table, replace the Image record
        Parameters:
        replaceImage - A complete Image object
        imageid - The primary key of the image you want to replace
        Returns:
        status of OK
        See Also:
        ImageService.save(Image)

      • updateImage

        @PatchMapping(value="/image/{imageid}",
              consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateImage​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                              @Valid Image updateImage,
                                                              @PathVariable
                                                              long imageid)
        Updates the image record associated with the given id with the provided data. Only the provided fields are affected.
        Parameters:
        updateImage - An object containing values for just the fields that are being updated. All other fields are left NULL.
        imageid - The primary key of the user you wish to update.
        Returns:
        A status of OK
        See Also:
        ImageService.update(Image, long)

      • deleteImageById

        @DeleteMapping(value="/image/{imageid}",
               produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteImageById​(@PathVariable
                                                                  long imageid)
        Deletes a given image
        Parameters:
        imageid - the primary key of the user you wish to delete
        Returns:
        Status of OK
        See Also:
        UserService.delete(long)
